item.title: Elon Musk: Death Threats Funded by Leftist 'NGO Cabal'
item.description: Elon Musk said some of the recent death threats he has received are from "whack jobs" funded by left-wing organizations.

item.title: Trump to The Atlantic: When You Have a Writer With Intelligence, Let Me Know
item.description: President Donald Trump refused an apparent request from The Atlantic for an interview, posting he had better things to do with his time.
